title: Facebook May Be Getting Too Close for Comfort
text:
Facebook wasn’t kidding when it said it wanted to move social networking into your living room.

Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg said in March that his leading social platforms would be working to enable more intimate conversations, moving away from “town-square” experiences. Early steps in this direction have included a new look for the legacy Facebook app that emphasizes “Groups” over public posts. Fleeting photo and video “Stories” that can be shared only with close friends have also been growing quickly.

...
description: The tech titan is moving social networking into your home, but that may not be a safe bet.
